original: Karsberg, Nils Otto, civilingenjör, Göteborg, f. 23/3/86 i Råda, Gbgs o. Boh. 1., av kamr. August K. o. Marie Louise Andersson. G. 14 m. Gerda Katarina Engholm. Barn: Marie-Louise f. 16, d. 46. — CTH 05. Anst. v. Gbgs stads hamnstyr. 06-07, dess elverk 08-10, General Electric i Lynn, Mass., USA, 10-11, Före River Ship-building Corp. i Quincy, Mass., USA, 11-19, Lake Torpedoboat Co. i Bridgeport, Conn., USA, 19-21, v. Götaverken i Gbg sed. 24. RVO.
translated: Karsberg, Nils Otto, engineer, Gothenburg, b. 23/3/86 in Råda, Gothenburg and Bohus County, 1st child of colleagues August K. and Marie Louise Andersson. Married on the 14th of an undisclosed month in an undisclosed year to Gerda Katarina Engholm. Children: Marie-Louise b. 16, d. 46. - Graduated from Chalmers University of Technology in 1905. Employed by Gothenburg City Port Authority from 1906 to 1907, Gothenburg Power Plant from 1908 to 1910, General Electric in Lynn, Massachusetts, USA, from 1910 to 1911, Före River Ship-building Corp. in Quincy, Massachusetts, USA, from 1911 to 1919, Lake Torpedoboat Co. in Bridgeport, Connecticut, USA, from 1919 to 1921, and at Götaverken in Gothenburg since 1924. Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO).
